content.text: Hi, I'm Sarah.
Hi, I'm Alice.
I'm a fashion designer.
That's cool! I'm retired from banking, but I used to sew in my spare time.
Oh, that's awesome! I love to sew too.
I'm glad to hear that. I used to make quilts for my relatives.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to make a quilt.
It's not too hard, you should try it!
I think I might just do that.
Great! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
So, what's your inspiration for your designs?

I get my inspiration from a lot of different things. I love nature, so I often draw inspiration from flowers, animals, and landscapes. I also love fashion history, and I'm always looking for new ways to incorporate vintage elements into my designs.
That's so cool! I love that you draw inspiration from nature. I think that's really beautiful.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
So, what's your favorite design you've ever made?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think one of my favorites is a dress I made for my sister's wedding. It was a beautiful, flowing gown that she looked amazing in.
That sounds beautiful! I'm sure she loved it.
She did! She wore it to her wedding and to the reception. It was a big hit.
That's so great! I'm sure you were so proud of her.
I was! It was a really special day.
